title: The Indian in the cupboard
creator_credit: Frank Oz, Jane Startz, Frank Marshall, Kathleen Kennedy, Scholastic Productions and Kennedy/Marshall Company
brief_description: Based on the book by Lynne Reid Banks, ‘The Indian in the cupboard’ is a heartwarming adventure about nine year old Omri who magically brings his three-inch toy Indian Little Bear to life. Some of the scenes may not be suitable for very young children however the amazing adventures of these two friends is sure to delight.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Oz, Jane Startz, Frank Marshall, Kathleen Kennedy, Scholastic Productions and Kennedy/Marshall Company
